CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"Medical"), 365,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"Dental"), 65,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"Life"), 15,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"LMB"), 135,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"LTD"),35,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"Other"), 15,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"STD"), 35,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"Vision"),15,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"Voluntary"),15,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"MEC"),60,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"MVP"),135,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type__c,"MVP Preferred"),240,0)
CustomField.label: Rev. Per App
